notes.title: Funding
notes.p: ISGlobal is a member of the CERCA Programme, Generalitat de Catalunya. CISM is supported by the Government of Mozambique and the Spanish Agency for International Development (AECID). BG received financial support for this study from Mundo Sano Foundation ( www.mundosano.org). The funders had no role in study design, data collection, analysis, interpretation of data, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
